pages.text: This item is used to grind certain items into other items. For example, you can grind dried tobacco leaves into tobacco.$(br)$(br)More can be seen in the next pages.

To fill the grinder, you simply place it inside your crafting grid along with the item you want to grind.$(br)$(br)Once you have done that, you can hold the filled manual grinder and hold right-click to grind the item.
